abstract: Ben Ratliff reviews concert of John Coltrane works performed by pianist Eric Reed and bassist Reggie Workman, with jazz ensemble African-American Legacy Project, at the Rose Theater; show is part of 50th anniversary commemoration of jazz label Impulse Records.
snippet: Reggie Workman, the principal bassist on the original John Coltrane recording of “Africa/Brass,” performed all the music from that album with his African-American Legacy Project.
lead_paragraph: Reggie Workman, the principal bassist on the original John Coltrane recording of “Africa/Brass,” performed all the music from that album with his African-American Legacy Project.

headline.seo: Reggie Workman and Eric Reed at Rose Theater - Review
